entries.title: Alphabet's Layoffs Aren’t Very Googley
entries.description: The company’s founders pioneered putting employees first and said they’d never bow down to Wall Street. How things have changed.

entries.title: ADS-B Exchange, the Flight Tracker That Powered @ElonJet, Sold to Jetnet
entries.description: ADS-B Exchange, beloved for resisting censorship, was sold to a company owned by private equity—and now even its biggest fans are bailing.

entries.title: Big Tech Is Really Bad at Firing People
entries.description: Workers from Google, Meta, and Twitter reveal the brutal ways they got dumped.
